belongs_to_collection.name: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi no Video Collection

original_title: ほんとにあった！呪いのビデオ６
overview: The 5th popular series that runs the No. 1 of psychic horror documentaries! This time, we focused on school ghost stories and strange phenomena, a collection of psychic images by general posts!!
tagline: It's really scary! Can you face the truth projected by the camera?
title: Honto ni Atta! Noroi no Video 6
